Intro.text: Hello there adventurer! Welcome to the dungeon, will you go left or right?

Boss Room 1.text: You stand in a room with the remnants of the skeleton you just defeated, a large door opens to your left

Bridge.text: A room with water running under a large bridge, across it the path splits into three. You feel an ominous wind coming from the middle door

Room 3.text: A very uninteresting room, its a dead end. At least you found some Bandages

Boss Room 2.text: You beat the Ogre, but something didn't seem right, he already looked dead... Some stairs are found to your right, it smells of rot and decay
